Package com.example.midterm_manelespinosa.controller

Class AdminController

java.lang.Object
com.example.midterm_manelespinosa.controller.AdminController
@RestController public class AdminController extends Object
The AdminController class is used to establish all the routes that will be used for the admin to manage the accounts and users. All the following routes verify that the user logged in is an admin.

  • Method Details

    • getBasicAccounts

      @GetMapping("/admin/accounts") @PreAuthorize("hasRole(\'ADMIN\')") @ResponseStatus(OK) public List<BasicAccount> getBasicAccounts()
      This routes shows the admin all the accounts
      Returns:
      a list of all the accounts in the database

    • getBasicAccountsById

      @GetMapping("/admin/accounts/{id}") @PreAuthorize("hasRole(\'ADMIN\')") @ResponseStatus(OK) public BasicAccount getBasicAccountsById(@PathVariable Long id)
      This route shows a specific account(id).
      Parameters:
      id - this is the id of the account that needs to be shown. Passed as a path variable
      Returns:
      it returns the route that has the id passed if exists.

    • getUsers

      @GetMapping("/admin/users") @PreAuthorize("hasRole(\'ADMIN\')") @ResponseStatus(OK) public List<User> getUsers()
      THis route shows all the users in the database.
      Returns:
      return a list of all the users in the database.

    • getUsersById

      @GetMapping("/admin/users/{id}") @PreAuthorize("hasRole(\'ADMIN\')") @ResponseStatus(OK) public User getUsersById(@PathVariable Long id)
      This routes show the user information that belongs to the id passed.
      Parameters:
      id - this is the id og the user that needs to be shown. It is passed in the route as a path variable.
      Returns:
      returns the user requested.

    • newSavings

      @PostMapping("/admin/accounts/savings") @PreAuthorize("hasRole(\'ADMIN\')") @ResponseStatus(CREATED) public SavingsAccount newSavings(@Valid @RequestBody @Valid SavingsAccountCreate newSavings)
      THis route is used to create a savings account.
      Parameters:
      newSavings - this is a DTO class that is used to pass all the information in the body to create the savings account.
      Returns:
      It returns the account created.

    • newCheckingAccount

      @PostMapping("/admin/accounts/checkingaccount") @PreAuthorize("hasRole(\'ADMIN\')") @ResponseStatus(CREATED) public BasicAccount newCheckingAccount(@Valid @RequestBody @Valid CheckingAccountCreate newChecking)
      THis route is used to creat a checking account or student account depending on the age.
      Parameters:
      newChecking - this is a DTO class used to pass, in the body, all the information needed to create the checking account.
      Returns:
      returns the checking account created.

    • newCreditCard

      @PostMapping("/admin/accounts/creditcard") @PreAuthorize("hasRole(\'ADMIN\')") @ResponseStatus(CREATED) public CreditCard newCreditCard(@Valid @RequestBody @Valid CreditCardCreate newCreditCard)
      THis route is used to create a credit cad account.
      Parameters:
      newCreditCard - this is a DTO class used to pass, in the body,all the information needed to create a credit card account
      Returns:
      it retuns the credit card account created

    • getBasicAccountsBalanceById

      @GetMapping("/admin/accounts/{id}/balance") @PreAuthorize("hasRole(\'ADMIN\')") @ResponseStatus(OK) public Money getBasicAccountsBalanceById(@PathVariable Long id)
      This route is used for the admin to see the balance of a specific account.
      Parameters:
      id - : id of the account which balance the admin wants to see. It is passed as path variable in the route.
      Returns:
      it returns the balance of the account that has the id passed in the route.

    • updateBasicAccountsBalanceById

      @PatchMapping("/admin/accounts/{id}/balance") @PreAuthorize("hasRole(\'ADMIN\')") @ResponseStatus(OK) public Money updateBasicAccountsBalanceById(@PathVariable Long id, @Valid @RequestBody @Valid BigDecimal newBalance)
      This route is used to modify the balance of a specific account.
      Parameters:
      id - id of the account which balance the admin wants to modify. It is passed as path variable in the route.
      newBalance - : quantity passed in the body which will be the new balance.
      Returns:
      it returns the balance allready modified.

    • addSecondaryOwner

      @PatchMapping("/admin/accounts/{id}/add_change_SecondaryOwner") @PreAuthorize("hasRole(\'ADMIN\')") @ResponseStatus(OK) public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> addSecondaryOwner(@PathVariable Long id, @Valid @RequestBody @Valid String username)
      This route is used to add or change the second owner of an account.
      Parameters:
      id - id of the account which second owner the admin wants to add or change
      username - username of the user which will be the new second owner. It is passed in the body.
      Returns:
      it returns a message saying that the second owner has successfully been added.

    • changeToFrozen

      @PatchMapping("/admin/accounts/{id}/frozenAccount") @PreAuthorize("hasRole(\'ADMIN\')") @ResponseStatus(OK) public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> changeToFrozen(@PathVariable Long id)
      This account is used to for the admin to frozen a specific account.
      Parameters:
      id - id of the account that has to be frozen.
      Returns:
      it returns a message saying that the account has successfully been frozen.

    • changeToActive

      @PatchMapping("/admin/accounts/{id}/activateAccount") @PreAuthorize("hasRole(\'ADMIN\')") @ResponseStatus(OK) public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> changeToActive(@PathVariable Long id)
      This account is used to for the admin to activate a specific account.
      Parameters:
      id - id of the account that has to be activated.
      Returns:
      it returns a message saying that the account has successfully been activated.

    • createThirdPartyUser

      @PostMapping("/admin/third_party/signup") @PreAuthorize("hasRole(\'ADMIN\')") @ResponseStatus(CREATED) public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> createThirdPartyUser(@Valid @RequestBody @Valid SignupThirdPartyRequest newThirdPartyUser)
      This route is used for the admin to create a third party user.
      Parameters:
      newThirdPartyUser - this is a DTO class used to pass al the information needed to create a third party user. It is passed through the body.
      Returns:
      it returns the user created.

    • deleteUser

      @DeleteMapping("/admin/delete/user/{id}") @PreAuthorize("hasRole(\'ADMIN\')") @ResponseStatus(OK) public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> deleteUser(@PathVariable Long id)
      This route is used to delete a user.
      Parameters:
      id - id of the user that has to be deleted
      Returns:
      returns a message confirming that the user has been deleted.

    • deleteAccount

      @DeleteMapping("/admin/delete/account/{id}") @PreAuthorize("hasRole(\'ADMIN\')") @ResponseStatus(OK) public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> deleteAccount(@PathVariable Long id)
      This route is used to delete an account.
      Parameters:
      id - id of the account that has to be deleted
      Returns:
      returns a message confirming that the account has been deleted.
